trans-unit.source: Contains meta-information about an individual element within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Contém informações de metadados sobre um elemento individuais dentro da configuração.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The ElementInformation object contains meta-information about an individual element within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: O objecto de ElementInformation contém informações de metadados sobre um elemento individuais dentro da configuração.

trans-unit.source: This object can be used when validating and changing the properties of an individual element.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto pode ser utilizado quando a validação e alterar as propriedades de um elemento individuais.

trans-unit.source: Gets the errors for the associated element and subelements
trans-unit.target: Obtém os erros para o elemento associado e subelementos

trans-unit.source: The collection containing the errors for the associated element and subelements
trans-unit.target: A coleção que contém os erros para o elemento associado e subelementos

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o associado <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto é um <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"></xref> collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o associado <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto é um <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection"> </xref> coleção; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o associado <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto não pode ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: The IsLocked property returns `true` when the related element is locked by the <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowOverride%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>, or <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAllAttributesExcept%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Devolve de propriedade IsLocked `true` quando o elemento relacionado está bloqueado pelo <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowOverride%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>, ou <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAllAttributesExcept%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.LockAllAttributesExcept%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowOverride%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object cannot be modified; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o associado <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto não pode ser modificada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o associado <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto está no ficheiro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is in the configuration file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o associado <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto está no ficheiro de configuração; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the line number in the configuration file where the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is defined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de linha no ficheiro de configuração onde associada <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto está definido.

trans-unit.source: The line number in the configuration file where the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object is defined.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha na configuração do ficheiro onde associada <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto está definido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection of the properties in the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> coleção as propriedades da associada <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The properties of a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> object are the attributes and subelements associated with that configuration element in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades de um <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>objeto são os atributos e subelementos associados a esse elemento de configuração no ficheiro de configuração.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"></xref> collection of the properties in the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.PropertyInformationCollection"> </xref> coleção as propriedades da associada <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source file where the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object originated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o ficheiro de origem onde associada <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto teve originado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement> object may be created in a default state, in which case this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>objeto pode ser criado no estado predefinido, caso em que esta propriedade devolve `null`.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement>

trans-unit.source: The source file where the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object originated.
trans-unit.target: A origem de ficheiros onde associada <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto teve originado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de associada <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The type of the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de associada <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object used to validate the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto utilizado para validar associada <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A validator object is not required, and this property may return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de validador não é necessário e esta propriedade pode devolver `null`.

trans-unit.source: The object used to validate the associated <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto utilizado para validar associada <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"> </xref> objeto.
